title: Hail of Thorns
tags: how to acquire hail of thorns
content:
can be acquired by the following classes:

Ranger Beast Master (Ranger Subclass) Hunter (Ranger Subclass) Gloom Stalker (Ranger Subclass)

Hail of Thorns can be cast by using the following Items:

Gloves of Hail of Thorns ???

Hail of Thorns Tips & Notes

Notes & Tips go here
